TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RegistrationException extends System.SystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a registration error is detected.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example contains a catch block that shows how to handle a registration exception.

Gets an array of objects that describe registration errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When a catalog error COMADMIN_E_OBJECTERRORS occurs the registration helper will read the `ErrorInfo` collection, and return it through the ErrorInfo property.
